snippet: The planes were sent to support an attempt by French commandos to rescue a French agent held hostage in Somalia, President Obama told Congress in a letter Sunday.
abstract: Pres Obama tells Congress in letter that American warplanes entered Somali airspace in support of attempt by French commandos to rescue French agent held hostage by Al Shabab militants in Somalia.
lead_paragraph: The planes were sent to support an attempt by French commandos to rescue a French agent held hostage in Somalia, President Obama told Congress in a letter Sunday.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
